oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Selections from an Eddy Arnold program
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Selected performances from an Eddy Arnold transcription. Song selections include Grand Canyon Line, She'll Be Coming Round The Mountain, You're My Everything, and My Babies Coming Home.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) [Unidentified engineer] announces take number [incomplete] / (0:22) [Unidentified] performs "Grand Canyon Line" / (1:42) [Unidentified engineer] announces take number / (1:46) [Unidentified] performs "She'll Be Coming Round The Mountain" / (2:44) [Unidentified engineer] announces take number / (2:49) Eddy Arnold performs "You're My Everything" / (5:08) [Unidentified engineer] announces take number / (5:19) [Unidentified] performs "My Babies Coming Home" / (7:23) Eddy Arnold narrates a voice over about a picnic grove [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008
